name: *Clearance* Fine silver & enamel Bloom drops
description:
This is 1 of 3 remaining pairs of fine silver Cherry Blossom drop earrings! I only make silver enameled jewelry by commission now.

The flowers are enameled fine silver, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The flowers are about 3/8" in diameter, and the earrings hang about 2 1/2" in length from the ear wire.

Feel free to contact me if you are interested in commissioning a custom piece!

name: *Clearance* Flute Flower Pendant (no chain included)
description:
This is the last piece left from my limited edition Flute Flower collection! I've removed the chain to be able to discount the price further. The bails should be large enough for most chains to fit through. 

The collection was called Flute Flowers because the petals were originally made from the bit of silver that is punched out of the mouthpiece of the flute! I thought they looked like flower petals, and soldered them into different combinations to make different flower shapes. 

The pendant is a bit over 1 1/4" in diameter.

name: *Clearance* Sterling Silver Enameled Blooming Branch Necklace
description:
This is my last sterling silver version of my Blooming Branch necklaces! The solid sterling silver branch is adorned with two enameled fine silver flowers. The larger, dark purple one measures about 5/8" in diameter, and the total length of the necklace is 16 1/2". 

Feel free to contact me if you wish to commission another silver enameled piece!

name: *Clearance* Fine silver & enamel Cherry Blossom drops
description:
This is my very last pair of fine silver Cherry Blossom drop earrings! I no longer make this style, and only make silver enameled jewelry by commission now. 

The flowers are enameled fine silver, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter, and the earrings hang about 2 1/2" in length from the ear wire. 

Feel free to contact me if you are interested in commissioning any of my pieces in silver instead of copper!

name: *NEW* Yellow Leaf Pendant
description:
From my newest collection of multicolored leaf pendants and earrings.

This is a bright yellow leaf with a touch of emerald green! 

The leaf is just over 2" long and hangs on a 18" sterling silver snake chain.

Each of these is unique, and no two will be exactly alike due to the process of adding the accent colors atop the main leaf color. (So yours will look a lot like this, but not match exactly!)

name: Blooming Branch Circle Drops
description:
These lightweight earrings are wonderful for both everyday and more dressy occasions!

The cast branch circle is bronze, and is just under an inch in diameter. The Bloom flower and ear wire are both sterling silver, and the earring is just under 1 3/4″ in total length.

name: *NEW* Green Leaf Pendant
description:
From my newest collection of multicolored leaf pendants and earrings!

Like a summer leaf just before fall, this bright green has just a peek of bright yellow.

The leaf is just over 2″ long and hangs on a 18″ sterling silver snake chain.

Each of these is unique, and no two will be exactly alike due to the process of adding the accent colors atop the main leaf color. (So yours will look a lot like this, but will not match exactly!)

name: *NEW* Red Leaf Pendant
description:
From my newest collection of multicolored leaf pendants and earrings.

This is a bright scarlet leaf with a bright yellow accent. Perfect for chasing away the winter blues! 

The leaf is just over 2" long and hangs on a 18" sterling silver snake chain.

Each of these is unique, and no two will be exactly alike due to the process of adding the accent colors atop the main leaf color. (So yours will look a lot like this, but not match exactly!)

name: *NEW* Frosty Leaf Pendant
description:
From my newest collection of multicolored leaf pendants and earrings.

This is my favorite color combination in this collection, like a brown leaf covered in a frost of icy blue and white.

The leaf is just over 2" long and hangs on a 18" sterling silver snake chain. 

Each of these is unique, and no two will be exactly alike due to the process of adding the accent colors atop the main leaf color. (So yours will look a lot like this, but not match exactly!)

name: Tri-Seed Pod "Blooming Branch" Pendant
description:
When I found this seed pod with three seeds instead of the usual two, I knew I had to cast it and make a mold to make jewelry with! 

This pendant features one of my 3/8" diameter flowers, on a 17" sterling silver cable chain.

name: Berry "Blooming Branch" Pendant
description:
This necklace is one of a kind! Cast from a real branch of small, textured berries, the bronze retains all the texture from the plant!

The sterling silver cable chain is 17" long, and the pendant itself is 1 3/8" long.

name: Dogwood "Blooming Branch" Pendant
description:
This pendant is one of a kind! Cast from a real dogwood branch, the bronze retains all the texture from the wood, features four of my sterling silver flowers. 

The sterling silver cable chain is 17" long, and the pendant itself is 2 1/2" long, and about 1" in depth.

name: Red & Cream "Petals" Necklace
description:
Copper & enamel petals on graduated sterling silver stems make an elegant, modern necklace with a retro feel.

The longest stem measures 1 1/2" and the sterling silver snake chain is 18" long.

name: Jade & Pistachio Green "Jessica" Pendant
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems and 18" snake chains. The longer of the two measures 2" in length. The flowers are about 3/4" in diameter, and just over 1/4" deep.

name: Grey & Yellow "Jessica" Pendant
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems and 18" snake chains. The longer of the two measures 2" in length. The flowers are about 3/4" in diameter, and just over 1/4" deep.

description:

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems and 18" snake chains. The longer of the two measures about 2" in length. The flowers are about 3/4" in diameter, and just over 1/4" deep.

description:

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems and 18" snake chains. The longer of the two measures about 2" in length. The flowers are about 3/4" in diameter, and just over 1/4" deep.

name: Jade & Pistachio Green "Bloom" Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings are a bright & fun addition to your jewelry collection! 

The flowers are copper & enamel, and measure 3/8" in diameter. The stems & ear wires are sterling silver, and the earrings measure 2" in total length.

name: Grey & Yellow "Bloom" Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings are a bright & fun addition to your jewelry collection! 

The flowers are copper & enamel, and measure 3/8" in diameter. The stems & ear wires are sterling silver, and the earrings measure 2" in total length.

name: Red & Cream "Bloom" Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings are a bright & fun addition to your jewelry collection! 

The flowers are copper & enamel, and measure 3/8" in diameter. The stems & ear wires are sterling silver, and the earrings measure 2" in total length.

name: Blue & Purple "Bloom" Drop Earrings
description:
These earrings are a bright & fun addition to your jewelry collection! 

The flowers are copper & enamel, and measure 3/8" in diameter. The stems & ear wires are sterling silver, and the earrings measure 2" in total length.

name: Red & Cream "Cherry Blossom" 2 Stem Necklace
description:
Bright red and cream flowers make a great addition to your spring and summer wardrobe! The flowers are copper and enamel, the stems and snake chain are sterling silver.

The chain measures 18" in length; the longest stem is 2 5/8" long.

name: Jewel Toned "Cherry Blossom" 2 Stem Necklace
description:
Beautiful, bright shades of blue, green and pink! The flowers are copper and enamel, the stems and snake chain are sterling silver.

The chain measures 18" in length; the longest stem is 2 1/2" long.

name: Blue & Purple "Cherry Blossom" 2 Stem Necklace
description:
This bright blue and purple is one of my favorite combinations this season! The flowers are copper and enamel, the stems and snake chain are sterling silver.

The chain measures 18" in length; the longest stem is 2" long.

name: Jade & Pistachio Green "Cherry Blossom" 3 Stem Necklace
description:
The two shades of green make a beautiful spring and summer necklace! The flowers are copper and enamel, the stems and snake chain are sterling silver.

The chain measures 18" in length; the longest stem is 2 5/8" long, the shortest 1 3/8".

name: Grey & Yellow "Cherry Blossom" 3 Stem Necklace
description:
A bright, nearly neon shade of yellow is a great contrast to the cool, neutral grey. 

The chain measures 18" in length; the longest stem is 2 3/4" long, the shortest is 1 3/8".

name: Seed Pod & Pearl Earrings
description:
The cast bronze seed pods have a wonderful texture that catch the light, highlighting the soft glow of the freshwater pearls below. 

The earrings are about 1 3/8" in total length, and the ear wires are sterling silver. 

Bronze oxidizes more quickly than silver; a liquid sterling silver cleaner (such as Tarn-X) and a polishing cloth are all you need to keep them bright and shiny, if you prefer that to the rich brown that they oxidize to. Just be careful not to submerge the pearl into any liquid jewelry cleaners--hold the earring by the pearl whilst dipping, and rinse quickly in case of any contact.

name: 4 in 1 "Cherry Blossom" Studs
description:
I've wanted to make these for a long time--they're so versatile! These stackable studs can be worn in 4 different ways: with the Cherry Blossom, stamens, and Dogwood studs, the Cherry Blossoms with just the Dogwood studs, the stamens with just the Dogwood studs, or the Dogwood studs on their own! 

The Cherry Blossom flower, wire stamens, earring posts and clutches are all sterling silver. The Dogwood stud is bronze, and was cast from an actual dogwood! 

The Cherry Blossom flower is 5/8" in diameter. The last photo shows all of the different wearing options together for reference, but please note that this listing is for *one* pair only. (Two Cherry Blossoms, two stamens, and two Dogwood studs).

name: Long Copper & Blue "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

These are a bit longer than the other pair; sometimes when creating a new collection, I like to play with different proportions and lengths!

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 3/4" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Long Red & Cream "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

These are a bit longer than the other pair; sometimes when creating a new collection, I like to play with different proportions and lengths! 

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 3/4" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Coral & Wedgwood Blue "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The combination of warm coral and cool blue is great for summer and fall. 

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 5/8" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Red & Cream "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

This is one of my favorite color combinations this season, the bright red is wonderful with the light cream!

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The  earrings measure 2 5/8" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Grey & Yellow "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The yellow is a bright, nearly neon yellow! I love the combination with the cool, neutral grey. 

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 5/8" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Blue & Copper "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 5/8" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter and 1/4" deep.

name: Blue & Purple "Jessica" Drop Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The enameled copper flowers are on sterling silver stems. The earrings are 2 5/8" in total length, and the flowers are just under 1/2" in diameter, and 1/4" deep.

name: *Clearance* Royal Blue Pinwheel Earrings
description:
*Discontinued* Get them while they last! 

The overlapping petals give these flowers a fun spiral effect, reminding me of the pinwheels I had as a child! 

This is a bright, true blue--wonderful in any season. 

The copper & enamel pinwheel is 3/4" in diameter, and the earrings are 2" in total length. The stems and ear wires are sterling silver.

name: Sterling Silver "Bloom" Studs
description:
These sterling silver earrings the smallest ones I make, measuring about 3/8" in diameter. Small, simple studs that are ideal for every day wear. 

They also coordinate perfectly with my bronze & sterling silver "Blooming Branch" necklaces and bracelets.

I add a shimmery, shiny texture to the petals and center of each flower, and use sterling silver posts and clutches.

name: Sterling Silver "Jessica" Stud Earrings
description:
I named this collection after one of my bridal customers. I loved the flower I created for her ring so much, that I asked her if she'd mind if I used it in my production line. I named it after her as a way to say thank you! (Thanks, Jess!)

The silver stud version of these earrings really showcase the beautiful spiral the overlapping petals create. I added shimmery texture and central detail as well, making them great for day or evening wear. 

They measure about 1/2" in diameter, and feature sterling silver posts and clutches.

name: "Cherry Blossom" Drop Earrings
description:
These sterling silver earrings are my shortest drop earrings, and feather-light. They're great for everyday wear, and for those who prefer a shorter drop earring style. 

They also coordinate perfectly with my bronze & sterling silver "Blooming Branch" necklaces and bracelets.

I add a shimmery, shiny texture to the petals and center of each flower. They measure 5/8" in diameter, hanging 5/8" from the ear wire.

name: "Cherry Blossom" Stud Earrings
description:
These sterling silver earrings are great for everyday wear--simple, elegant studs that can be worn with nearly anything. 

They also coordinate perfectly with my bronze & sterling silver "Blooming Branch" necklaces and bracelets. 

I add a shimmery, shiny texture to the petals and center of each flower. They measure 5/8" in diameter, and have sterling silver posts and clutches.

name: White Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

A bright pure white--clean and fresh, these look great with nearly everything! 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Yellow Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

I know a lot of people think they cannot wear yellow, but I think a lot more of you look good in it than you think! I love this sunny, canary yellow enamel. 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Violet Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

This violet is a cool toned, mid purple enamel that looks great with it's blue-green flower at the back! Springy and fun, these look great all year long. 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Dark Pink Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

This is a great darker shade of pink--warm in tone, and lovely with the bright green accent flower at the back. The pink Cherry Blossoms tend to be very popular--perhaps because they resemble their inspiration the most? 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Red & Cream Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

I'm really liking my newest hoops, featuring new color combinations. These were a big hit over the holidays, and I can see them fitting well into a summer wardrobe as well! Bright, candy apple red looks even more dramatic against the light cream flower at the back. 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Navy Blue & Cream Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

I recently started using colors other than green as the backing flower for these hoops, and I love the results! This is a wonderful nautical color combination-classic navy blue with a warm cream. 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!

name: Light Pink Cherry Blossom Hoops
description:
This is still my most popular earring style, and I'm so glad! They remain on of my personal favorites.

This is a much lighter, cooler toned pink enamel-almost a violet pink-and very pretty! These and their darker pink versions are definitely fan favorites, maybe because they look so much like  real cherry blossoms? 

The flowers are enameled copper, and the ear wires and flower stamens are sterling silver. The hoops measure 1 1/2" in diameter, and the larger front flower is about 5/8" in diameter.

Everything in this shop is handmade by me. If an item is sold out, feel free to contact me for an update on when they'll be available again!
